work.title: What do you do?
work.description: Describe your work or activities. This helps our AI assistant understand your context better.
work.placeholder: I am a programmer who wants to become an entrepreneur. Currently testing different ideas...

shortTerm.title: Short-term goals
shortTerm.description: What are your short-term goals? This helps our AI assistant provide more relevant suggestions.
shortTerm.placeholder: AI agents, reach $10k/month, create a business with minimum $1000/month income...

longTerm.title: Long-term goals
longTerm.description: What are your long-term goals? This helps our AI assistant align with your vision.

other.title: Any other context?
other.description: Is there anything else you want our AI assistant to know about you?
other.placeholder: Additional information that might be helpful...

alerts.exitTitle: Are you sure you want to exit?
alerts.exitDescription: Your profile setup is not complete. The AI assistant works best with complete information about your context and goals.

complete.title: Profile setup complete!
complete.description: You can always update your information in the user settings.

postponed.title: Setup postponed
postponed.description: You can complete your profile setup anytime in the user settings.
